item.description:
I am going to be hosting a medium sized gathering so that folks can taste my beers before the general pubic. It is a totally free event. I will have a few beers on tap including a IIPA that has been hopped 4 times, traditional wee heavy, Scottish 80 shilling ale, and a great Russian Imperial Stout

It is the yellow and blue house on the corner of Woodcliff and Rockledge.Â  If you get lost you can call me at 617-965-7618
item.name: Free Nano Brewery Tasting
